Title: "The Bomb Maker" by Thomas Harris

"The Bomb Maker" is a thriller novel, although it leans heavily toward the mystery genre. The story revolves around a character named Sam, a talented but disturbed engineer who creates sophisticated and deadly bombs.

The protagonist, Agent Terence Mann of the FBI, is tasked with tracking down Sam after a series of bombings occur in Washington, D.C. The novel delves into the intricate details of bomb creation and the cat-and-mouse game between the FBI and the elusive bomb maker.
